ygData.subject: Utility of flute with charm/pixie (was Char Catillion)
ygData.msgSnippet: Is that confirmed by testing or a subjective theory?  I always equip my flute when I want to improve my chances of getting a charm or pixie strike to stick.
ygData.messageBody:
Is that confirmed by testing or a subjective theory? I always equip my
flute when I want to improve my chances of getting a charm or pixie strike
to stick. First time I think I've seen a post that said the flute didn't
help with charm or pixie.

In all honesty, I wouldn't be too upset if it was true. That would allow me
to keep my weapons or other instruments equipped when I'm trying to charm or
pixie instead of switching back and forth. Also frees up one of my main
inventory slots since I can just keep the flute in a bag.

Galtin of E'ci

> As with all of our other wind based songs, the flute is utterly
> useless unless it's required (invisiblility). Using a flute for
> our other songs doesn't do anything. Charm, Pixie, Charisma,
> WaterBreathing, no duration improvement, resist lessening, or
> statistical adjustment can be noticed. Which is sad, and probably
> explains why my Darkwood Piccolo has no stats.
>
>
